Specimen Type: Bone marrow biopsy sections or other formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections
Purpose: To detect TRAP enzyme activity in tissue sections, primarily for the diagnosis of hairy cell leukemia.
Container: Positively charged microscope slide (from FFPE tissue block)
Equipment: Microtome, slide warmer, staining jars, water bath, timer, light microscope
